eon_selected.title: Connect to EON
eon_selected.subtext: There are existing devices from previous scans below.
eon_selected.subsubtext: Scan again to discover newly connected EON.

scanning.title: Scanning the network...
scanning.subtext: We're compiling a list of EON on the local network.

scanned_has_results.title: Connect to EON
scanned_has_results.subtext: You now have %scanResultsLength% EON profiles saved.
scanned_has_results.subsubtext: You may also scan again to discover more EON.

scanned_no_results.title: Ouch, that sucks.
scanned_no_results.subtext: We were unable to find EON on the network.
scanned_no_results.subsubtext: Please verify that EON is connected to the same network as this computer.

not_scanned.title: Let's get started
not_scanned.subtext: Workbench needs to locate EON on the local network.
not_scanned.subsubtext: Press the button below to rip it and stick it.

scanned_error.title: An error occurred during scanning...
scanned_error.subtext: Check your network connection and try again.
